channel.title: [PI] how do i add NEW crowns?
channel.description:
Alright guys, These are the ICONS i am using ATM on my server [See Below Picture]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/10shyd5.png[/img]
And These are the ones that i want TO USE/ADD.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/mww50g.png[/img]
[size=12pt]I have already replaced them in SPRITES folder with the new ones i want to use, but 'example': Server support/Advisor Rank those new icons DO NOT exist yet...my question is:HOW and WHERE do i add the new ones?[/size]

item.title: [PI] how do i add NEW crowns?
item.dc:creator: @Doggie_Skill Doggie Skill
item.description:
@Doggie_Skill wrote:

Go into Paint. It’s already on every computer. open that up, go to “Open” and go to the location of the client you are using. Double click it. Go to spirites, and scroll down until you see the mod crown and the admin crown and all of that. open it, and change the crown to the one you want. once it’s done, save, and close the client and re open. There ya go

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how do i add NEW crowns?

item.title: [PI] how do i add NEW crowns?
item.dc:creator: @Affengott Affengott
item.description:
@Affengott wrote:

its very simply u dont need to replace.
go into ur old crowns make them fully white. then go at ur new crowns.
copy it.
and but it at ur old crowns then it shud work
